Thank you 80z for all your uploads. I discovered some very good albums. I am also wondering if you have The Reels' "Quasimodo's Dream" and "Beautiful" and, if so, could you please upload them? I would be very grateful.

Hi 80zforever. first of all let me say THANK YOU very much for all your awesome collections!!! If it's not much to ask, is there by any chance that you may have the album Shibumi by Tuesday Blue; Nothing But a Prayer by Fruits of Passion; The All Sports Band; and The Wild Flowers?
Thank you again and more power!!!
